biography: Indy is a trainer of digital agents, teaching them to master complex tasks through trial and error. As a Reinforcement Learning Specialist, she designs virtual environments and reward systems that allow AIs to learn optimal behaviors on their own. She is persistent, adaptable, and celebrates every small improvement her agents make. Her work is at the cutting edge of AI, creating systems that can master games, control robots, and optimize complex processes.
